wikipedia_page.main: William Francis Stuart Jardine (20 March 1924 – 22 October 1999) was a  British professional ice hockey player. He played as a forward for the Glasgow Mohawks in the Scottish National League, and represented Great Britain at the 1948 Winter Olympics in Saint-Moritz. He was born in Glasgow, Scotland, United Kingdom.

response: * Frank Jardine (ice hockey) (1924–1999), British ice hockey player
